synopsis.text: How does a master thief like Lupin III find himself 500 years in the past, caught in the middle of a feud between two ancient tribes? It all begins with a quest for a lost underwater treasure, said to hold the secrets of time travel. Lupin, accompanied by his trusted companions Jigen and Goemon, and their relentless pursuer Inspector Zenigata, are transported through time by a mysterious man named Mamou. With a grudge against Lupin and a strange connection to Fujiko's ancestor, Mamou threatens to alter the course of history. As Lupin navigates the complexities of the past, he must find a way to return to his own time, all while unraveling the mystery of the lost treasure. This thrilling adventure is a remake of episode 13 in the original Lupin III series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
